## Expression type

The signature of an arrow function capable of being evaluated against source data and within an execution context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Expression<TSource = any, TReturn = any, TParent = any> = (source: TSource, context: ExecutionContext<TParent>) => TReturn;
```
**References:** [ExecutionContext](../fast-element.executioncontext/)
